mapper.insert: insert into cart values(cart_seq.nextval, (select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}), #{cartProductNo}, 1, #{cartPrice})
mapper.select: select * from cart where cart_member_no=(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}) and cart_product_no=#{cartProductNo}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_stock = cart_stock + 1, cart_price = cart_price * 2 where cart_member_no=(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}) and cart_product_no=#{cartProductNo}
mapper.select: select cart_product_no, product_name, product_filepath, cart_stock, cart_price from cart join product on cart_product_no = product_no where cart_member_no=(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId})
select sum(cart_price) as total_price from cart join product on cart_product_no = product_no where cart_member_no=(select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId})
